name: @pulsemcp/pulse-crawl
description: Local implementation of pulse-crawl MCP server

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:integration && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: node -e "import('fs/promises').then(fs => fs.rm('./dist/shared', {recursive: true, force: true}).then(() => fs.symlink('../../shared/dist', './dist/shared', 'dir')).then(() => console.log('Created dist symlink')).catch(e => console.error('Symlink error:', e.message)))"
scripts.predev: cd ../shared && npm run build && cd ../local && node setup-dev.js
scripts.prebuild: cd ../shared && npm run build && cd ../local && node setup-dev.js

author: PulseMCP
